mapper.select: SELECT d.*, p.dp_name FROM diet d LEFT JOIN diet_pic p ON d.di_num = p.dp_di_num WHERE d.di_date = CURDATE();
select i.*, p.ip_name from inbody i left join inbody_pic p ON i.ib_num = p.ip_ib_num where i.ib_date = curdate();
select w.*, p.wp_name from workout w left join workout_pic p ON w.wo_num = p.wp_wo_num where w.wo_date = curdate();

SELECT distinct di_me_id as id, di_date as date, 'diet' as type FROM diet union SELECT distinct ib_me_id as id, ib_date as date, 'inbody' as type FROM inbody union SELECT distinct wo_me_id as id, wo_date as date, 'workout' as type FROM workout
mapper.insert: insert into diet (di_name, di_date, di_score, di_ampm, di_time, di_me_id) value (#{diet.di_name}, #{diet.di_date}, #{diet.di_score}, #{diet.di_ampm}, #{diet.di_time}, #{diet.di_me_id})
insert into diet_pic(dp_name, dp_ori_name, dp_di_num) value(#{dp_name}, #{dp_ori_name}, #{dp_di_num})
insert into inbody (ib_date, ib_weight, ib_smm, ib_bfm, ib_me_id) value (#{ib_date}, #{ib_weight}, #{ib_smm}, #{ib_bfm}, #{ib_me_id})
insert into inbody_pic(ip_name, ip_ori_name, ip_ib_num) value(#{ip_name}, #{ip_ori_name}, #{ip_ib_num})
insert into workout (wo_title, wo_date, wo_ampm, wo_time, wo_minute, wo_text, wo_me_id) value (#{wo_title}, #{wo_date}, #{wo_ampm}, #{wo_time}, #{wo_minute}, #{wo_text}, #{wo_me_id})
insert into workout_pic(wp_name, wp_ori_name, wp_wo_num) value(#{wp_name}, #{wp_ori_name}, #{wp_wo_num})
